Globx.metaDescription: Introducing GlobX, the AI-based automated trading bot.
Globx.heroTagline: The most efficient and transparent risk minimization system
Globx.featuresMainDescLine1: Our AI-based trading system monitors the market 24/7 and automatically executes trades at the optimal timing.
Globx.featuresMainDescLine2: Leave the complex market analysis to GlobX,
Globx.feature1Desc: We provide various trading strategies to respond to market volatility and maximize profits.
Globx.feature2Desc: It never stops until profit is realized, ensuring no market opportunity is missed.
Globx.feature3Desc: We protect your assets and trade safely with a top-level security system.
Globx.firstTimeCard1Desc: Even while you sleep, GlobX monitors the market and captures optimal trading opportunities.
Globx.firstTimeCard2Desc: Generate profits automatically without complex chart analysis or market monitoring.
Globx.case1Desc: Even during busy work hours, GlobX automatically conducted trades, generating stable and consistent profits.
Globx.case2Desc: With an easy-to-use interface, even novice investors are managing their assets very safely and simply.
Globx.faqSubtitle: Check out everything you need to know about GlobX.
Globx.faqA1: Yes, GlobX encrypts and stores API keys and only uses trading permissions without withdrawal permissions to safely protect your assets.
Globx.faqA2: We use AI algorithms based on various technical indicators such as Moving Averages, RSI, and Bollinger Bands.
Globx.faqQ3: Are coins other than Bitcoin supported?
Globx.faqA3: Yes, major altcoins like Ethereum and Ripple are supported, and users can set the coins they want.
Globx.faqQ4: Is it available on both PC and mobile?
Globx.faqA4: Yes, responsive web design provides an optimized screen on all devices, including PCs, tablets, and mobile phones.
Globx.faqQ5: Are there any cases of financial loss?
Globx.faqA5: All investments carry risks. However, the AI is designed to minimize losses through Stop-loss functions.
Globx.faqQ6: How much does it cost to operate?
Globx.faqA6: In addition to the basic bot usage fee, exchange fees may apply. Please refer to the pricing page for details.
Globx.faqFooterText: Do you have any more questions?
